410.name: Portal: First Slice
410.description: Help yourself to a generous, 11-level serving of Portal: First Slice, the official demo for the game that challenges you to think with portals. The winner of numerous Game of the Year awards introduces you to the test chambers at the Aperture Science Enrichment Center, where you'll learn to solve physical puzzles by opening portals to maneuver objects, and yourself, through space.
410.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 俄语*, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 意大利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 瑞典语, 繁体中文
* 具有完全音频支持的语言
